com.fenbi.mp4j.comm

Class ProcessCommSlave

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fenbi.mp4j.comm.ProcessCommSlave

  • public class ProcessCommSlave
extends java.lang.Object
    ProcessCommSlave is used as multi-processes communication.
    Author:
    xialong

    • Field Summary

      ProcessCommSlave(java.lang.String loginName, java.lang.String masterHost, int masterPort)
      Process communication constructor, every process have just only one ProcessCommSlave instance.

      Different with reduce operation which only root process contains final reduced result, while all process receive the same reduced result in allreduce operation.

      Similar with allreduceArray(Object, Operand, IOperator, int, int), the container of this function is map, the values which have same key will be reduced, different processes can contain the same and different keys.

      List concat, the lists with the same key will be reduced(concat) together.

      Takes elements from all processes and gathers them to root process, the data container is map, the data in map regardless of the order, if different process have same keys, only one key(random) will be saved in root process.

        public ProcessCommSlave(java.lang.String loginName,
                        java.lang.String masterHost,
                        int masterPort)
                 throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Process communication constructor, every process have just only one ProcessCommSlave instance.
        Parameters:
        loginName - if you use ssh to execute command, you must provide login name, e.g. ssh loginName@host "your command"
        masterHost - master host name
        masterPort - master host port
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • gatherArray

        public <T> T gatherArray(T arrData,
                         com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                         int[] sendfroms,
                         int[] sendtos,
                         int rootRank)
                  throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Takes elements from all processes and gathers them to root process, the data container is array, process i send data interval [sendfroms[i], sendtos[i]) to root process, placed in the same positions, s.t. sendfroms[i] ≤ sendtos[i], sendfroms[i] ≥ sendtos[i-1]
        Parameters:
        arrData - data array, each process have the same length.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        sendfroms - sending start positions, included.
        sendtos - sending end positions, excluded
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        if this process is root, returned is gathered elements, otherwise, is invalid array, contains intermediate results.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • gatherMap

        public <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> gatherMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> mapData,
                                                       com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                                                       int rootRank)
                                                throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Takes elements from all processes and gathers them to root process, the data container is map, the data in map regardless of the order, if different process have same keys, only one key(random) will be saved in root process.
        Parameters:
        mapData - key is String, value is any object
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        if this process is root, returned is gathered elements, otherwise, is invalid map, contained intermediate comm result or null.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • allgatherArray

        public <T> T allgatherArray(T arrData,
                            com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                            int[] froms,
                            int[] tos)
                     throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Takes elements from all processes and gathers them to all processes. the operation can be viewed as a combination of gather and broadcast.
        Parameters:
        arrData - data array, each process have the same length.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        froms - the start position of process i to gathered is froms[i]
        tos - the end position of process i to gathered is tos[i]
        Returns:
        allgathered array
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • allgatherMap

        public <T> java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T>> allgatherMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> mapData,
                                                                          com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand)
                                                                   throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Takes elements from all processes and gathers them to all processes. Similar with allgatherArray(Object, Operand, int[], int[]), this container is map.
        Parameters:
        mapData - map data
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        Returns:
        map list
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • broadcastArray

        public <T> T broadcastArray(T arrData,
                            com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                            int from,
                            int to,
                            int rootRank)
                     throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Broadcast array in root process to all other processe(included itself).
        Parameters:
        arrData - data array, each process have the same length.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        from - start position to broadcast
        to - end position to broadcast
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        root array, interval is [from, to)
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • broadcast

        public <T> T broadcast(T value,
                       com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                       int rootRank)
                throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Broadcast single value in root process to all other processes(included itself).
        Parameters:
        value - value to be broadcast(only root process is valid)
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        the value of root process.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • broadcastMap

        public <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> broadcastMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> mapData,
                                                          com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                                                          int rootRank)
                                                   throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Broadcast map in root process to all other processes(included itself), similar with broadcastArray(Object, Operand, int, int, int), but this container is map.
        Parameters:
        mapData - map data
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        the root map.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • scatterArray

        public <T> T scatterArray(T arrData,
                          com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                          int[] recvfroms,
                          int[] recvtos,
                          int rootRank)
                   throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Send chunks of an array to different processes, the data container is array. process i receive data interval [recvfroms[i], recvtos[i]) from root process, placed in the same positions, s.t. recvfroms[i] ≤ recvtos[i], recvfroms[i] ≥ recvtos[i-1]
        Parameters:
        arrData - data array, each process have the same length.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        recvfroms - receiving start positions, included
        recvtos - receiving end positions, excluded
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        rank i receives data from root process, placed in [recvfroms[i], recvtos[i])
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • scatterMap

        public <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> scatterMap(java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T>> mapDataList,
                                                        com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                                                        int rootRank)
                                                 throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Send chunks of data to different processes, the data container is map. rank i receive data mapDataList.get(i) from root process.
        Parameters:
        mapDataList - list of maps to be scattered.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        rank i receives data mapDataList.get(i) from root process.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • reduceScatterArray

        public <T> T reduceScatterArray(T arrData,
                                com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                                com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator,
                                int from,
                                int[] counts)
                         throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        ReduceScatterArray operation can ve viewed as a combination of reduceArray(Object, Operand, IOperator, int, int, int) and scatterArray(Object, Operand, int[], int[], int).
        Parameters:
        arrData - data array, each process have the same length.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        from - start position of arrData to be ReduceScattered
        counts - rank i receive number of counts[i] elements reducescatter result.
        Returns:
        rank 0 receive interval is [from, counts[0]), rank 1 receive interval is [from+count[0], from+count[0]+count[1]), ...
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • reduceScatterMap

        public <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> reduceScatterMap(java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T>> mapDataList,
                                                              com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                                                              com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator)
                                                       throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        reduceScatterMap operation can be viewed as a combination of reduceMap(Map, Operand, IOperator, int) and scatterMap(List, Operand, int).
        Parameters:
        mapDataList - list of map
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        Returns:
        rank i process will receive reduce of mapDataList.get(i) in all process
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • reduceArray

        public <T> T reduceArray(T arrData,
                         com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                         com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator,
                         int from,
                         int to,
                         int rootRank)
                  throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        reduce all array elements, reduced result locate in root process
        Parameters:
        arrData - data array, each process have the same length.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        from - start position to reduce
        to - end position to reduce
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        if this process is root, reduced array is returned, otherwise, is invalid array, contains intermediate result.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • reduce

        public <T> T reduce(T value,
                    com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                    com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator,
                    int rootRank)
             throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        single value reduce
        Parameters:
        value - value to be reduced
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        if this process is root, reduced value is returned, otherwise, is a invalid value.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • reduceMap

        public <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> reduceMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> mapData,
                                                       com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                                                       com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator,
                                                       int rootRank)
                                                throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Similar with reduceArray(Object, Operand, IOperator, int, int, int), but the container is map.
        Parameters:
        mapData - map data
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        rootRank - root rank
        Returns:
        if this process is root, reduced map is returned, otherwise, invalid map or null is returned.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • reduceMapSetUnion

        public <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<T>> reduceMapSetUnion(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<T>> mapData,
                                                                              int rootRank,

        if this process is root, the set with the same key will be reduced together, otherwise, invalid map or null is returned.

        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • allreduceArray

        public <T> T allreduceArray(T arrData,
                            com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                            com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator,
                            int from,
                            int to)
                     throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Different with reduce operation which only root process contains final reduced result, while all process receive the same reduced result in allreduce operation.
        Parameters:
        arrData - data array, each process have the same length.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        from - start position to reduce
        to - end position to reduce
        Returns:
        arrData[i](rank) = reduce(arrData[i](rank_0), arrData[i](rank_1), ..., arrData[i](rank_slavenumber-1)),
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • allreduceArrayRpc

        public <T> T allreduceArrayRpc(T arrData,
                               com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                               com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator)
                        throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Similar with allreduceArray(Object, Operand, IOperator, int, int), but it's realized by rpc communication. It is suited to small data.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        arrData - data array, each process have the same length.
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        Returns:
        arrData[i](rank) = reduce(arrData[i](rank_0), arrData[i](rank_1), ..., arrData[i](rank_slavenumber-1)),
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • allreduce

        public <T> T allreduce(T value,
                       com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                       com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator)
                throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Similar with allreduceArray(Object, Operand, IOperator, int, int), this function only allreduce just only one elements.
        Parameters:
        value - the value for reduce
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        Returns:
        all processes receive the same reduced value.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • allreduceRpc

                          com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                          com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator)
                   throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException

      • allreduceMap

        public <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> allreduceMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> mapData,
                                                          com.fenbi.mp4j.operand.Operand operand,
                                                          com.fenbi.mp4j.operator.IOperator operator)
                                                   throws com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
        Similar with allreduceArray(Object, Operand, IOperator, int, int), the container of this function is map, the values which have same key will be reduced, different processes can contain the same and different keys.
        Parameters:
        mapData - map to be reduced
        operand - operand(there are 8 operands in Operands)
        operator - operator(different operands provide different operator in Operators)
        Returns:
        key value map, the values which have same key will be reduced together.
        Throws:
        com.fenbi.mp4j.exception.Mp4jException
